title: DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_DISTANCE
content:
0x9BA001CB45CBF6270x47531446// DoorSystemSetAutomaticDistance
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_DISTANCE(Hash doorHash, float distance, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);Parameters:doorHash: Door system identifierdistance: requestDoor: forceUpdate: On true invokes DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_DOOR_STATE; otherwise requestDoor is unused.
codeBlocks:
// DoorSystemSetAutomaticDistance
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_DISTANCE(Hash doorHash, float distance, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);

-- Example usage for DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_DISTANCE
DoorSystemSetAutomaticDistance(0, 0.0, false, false)
